name: Hurry Buddy!
description:
Defend youself with classic WASD and an weapon that aims in MOUSE
Shoot by pressing or holding left button(recommend holding)
enemies became more valuable AND tankier as your SCORE increases

Made for TriJam in less than 3 hours, so there's a LOOOT of unfinished stuff, like the main gameplay lol, my goal was 4 enemies and a tower for you to defend, but i didn't had enough time to do it

If you wonder, yes, i will complete this game, i like it, follow my social media for future information about this one project:
My Twitter

QA

Q:Where's the theme?
A:I didn't have time to do it :D its supposed to be about collecting carrots at the brown area of the battlefield, while collecting them, i wouldn't be able to attack but... it turned out impossible to do in the 3 hours "limit" i just wanted to post my attempt, better luck for me next time
